system.description:
You have come to be more at home on the battlefield than any stage, and your performances reflect this. You gain the following additional Battle Hymn options, which are only usable while you are in your War Dance:

  • Infectious Dance. Choose one creature within 30ft that can see you. You may cast the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.gitnhp5bf3rcee0b]{Wild Irresistible Dance} rare spell on them, benefitting from any active art specialties or masteries if appropriate, requiring a seen instead of a vocalized component, and requiring no concentration beyond that of the battle hymn.  A creature that saves against this battle hymn is immune to it for 24 hours.  This battle hymn lasts up to 1 minute, but ends early if you start a different battle hymn or if your War Dance ends.
  • Shared Dance. All allies within 60ft benefit from any adept dances you benefit from until the start of your next turn.
